statements: REVOKE SELECT ON PatientMedicalRecords FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT ON PatientMedicalRecords FROM user2
REVOKE UPDATE(diagnosis, treatment) ON PatientMedicalRecords FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON patients TO user1;
REVOKE UPDATE, DELETE ON patients TO user2;
REVOKE ALL ON patients TO user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON patients FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON appointments FROM user2
REVOKE ALL ON medical_records FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON patients FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON doctors FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON appointments FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON healthcare_provider FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON patient FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON appointment FROM user1
